@All: Please understand the importance of seeding. If everyone thinks Hit n Run then how will this whole P2P world survive. I have max 60 kbps download speed and i still seed to max. Hope you all will too.

P.S: Make a habit of clicking on the + sign on quality when you download. It does make a difference.
